articles.description: Nawaz Modi-Singhania and Raymond group chief Gautam Singhania have been locked in a bitter settlement dispute since November 2023.

articles.title: Vedanta shares rally 5.5% after Q4 results. Should you buy, sell or hold? - The Economic Times
articles.description: Shares of Vedanta surged 5.5% to Rs 403 on the BSE even as the company's revenue and profit declined during the March quarter.

articles.author: Shashank Pathak
articles.title: Mynavi acquires majority stake in HRtech startup Awign - Entrackr
articles.description: Awign, a work-as-a-service platform, has announced a strategic majority stake acquisition in an all cash deal from Mynavi Corporation.

articles.author: Shivendra Kumar
articles.title: F&O Ban List: Vodafone Idea enters trade ban on Friday. SAIL, 2 more stocks move out - The Economic Times
articles.description: The F&O contracts of any stock enter the ban period when the open interest (OI) on it crosses 95% of the market-wide positions limits or MWPL. The ban is reversed only if the open interest falls below 80%.
